jobDescription: ATA ANALYST  iuzeit.com is a unique and innovative product research website for people who want a wide range of trusted product information and ratings in one convenient place. We provide information based on a collection of reviews from various consumers, experts and even your friends, allowing our users to make informed buying decisions with the highest quality research.  Our team is growing and we are looking for members with a "startup mentality." This would allow the right person opportunities to grow and take on increased responsibility over various pieces of the business. We look for collaborative team members who are equally passionate about the mission of iuzeit.com, as being part of a fast paced, fun and entrepreneurial atmosphere.  What you will do:  Dive into iuzeits data to sniff out trends. Answer your own nested why questions about those trends before anybody else even has to scratch his or her head.  Collaborate with engineering colleagues and others across the organization to identify sources of relevant data sets.  Develop and maintain internally accessible tools to make commonly requested data easily accessible.  Serve as the data champion across the company, by making our data accessible and your conclusions useful.  Qualifications:  2+ years' experience in a SQL-intensive role, ideally in a BI/Analytics or data engineering/data science function.  Must be go-getter and an out-of-the-box thinker, passionate about growth and optimization.  Demonstrated attention to detail and commitment to reporting accuracy  Experience using data to advise or make business decisions  Excellent communication and interpersonal skills  Strong analytical skills  Bachelors degree required, preferably in math, economics, engineering, or related
